description: This file defines a React component 'RecordsPage' that implements a user interface for CRUD operations on records, including fetching data from an API, rendering a data table, and managing modal forms for editing and deletion.

methods.name: RecordsPage()
methods.description: Main React functional component managing the records list, form modals, and delete confirmations.

methods.name: fetchData
methods.description: Asynchronous function to fetch records data from API and update state.

methods.name: handleAdd
methods.description: Set up state to add a new record by showing the form.

methods.name: handleEdit
methods.description: Set up state to edit an existing record.

methods.name: handleDelete
methods.description: Prepare to delete a record by setting deleting state and showing confirmation modal.

methods.name: handleFormSubmit
methods.description: Handle submission of the record form, either creating or updating based on context.

methods.name: handleDeleteConfirm
methods.description: Perform the deletion of the record after user confirmation.

ctags.name: deleting
ctags.pattern: /^        message={deleting ? `Are you sure you want to delete "${deleting.name}"?` : ""}$/

fields.name: message={deleting ? `Are you sure you want to delete "${deleting.name}"?` : ""}
